title: Torahg the Warrior: Sword of Vengeance
description: In a time forgotten savage land of myths, monsters, and magic a young prince is brutally betrayed and framed for the death of his father , the king by a malevolent sorcerer and his own flesh and blood, his evil brother! Fleeing the kingdom into a life of exile the young man is transformed by his experience. For twenty long years he is hardened and forged into a savage weapon of vengeance. After two decades of wandering the world the time is nigh for his return. But he is no longer the na√Øve young prince who left his homeland of Fairandia lo so many years ago. Now upon his return he will forevermore be known as 'Torahg the Warrior: Sword of Vengeance!' and woe be unto any who seek to bar his path! A new hero is born! One who will proudly stand beside such heroic figures as John Carter, Tarzan, Kull and Conan!
author: Ralph L. Angelo Jr.
